Posts.Content: Mar 11, 2008 07:21PM Gwennie wrote: Hello everyone, I have had 16 rad as of today.  17 more to go.  Every night I liberally use Eucerin.  So far very good result, only a tiny bit pink.  My Onc nurse said try the Aquafur if the Eucerin stops working.    I would like to find cotton bras if anyone is still making them.  Anyone found any nice ones?
